summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces substantial new gameplay/UI features and PWA/service-worker changes that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded password gate, screen flow/routing, and multiple event support (including new screens like PasswordGateScreen and LoadingScreen).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these implemented features are not traceable to any requested requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/modified localStorage persistence utilities and enhanced level unlocking/progress logic via new/updated storage modules and hooks.
Added/expanded game content assets and narrative content (uploaded image mapping utilities, win/lose messages, and a collection of 100 personalized love/promise letters).
Updated UI theming and gameplay screens with dual theme support, new navigation controls (e.g., "Back to Events"), and modified level implementations (e.g., Level001 changes).
Added PWA diagnostics/development panel and changed layout wrapper behavior (InstallBanner conditional rendering, PwaDiagnosticsPanel).
Significant service worker caching and versioning changes (cache busting, network-first for manifest/icons, aggressive cache cleanup).
Updated/introduced project tracking metadata indicating PWA installability issues and fix request state.
